review_data.title: Great food!
review_data.content: We had dinner there to celebrate my daughter's birthday. There were 7 of us. The food was delicious and the service was excellent. We had a couple of bottles that were suggested to us and we were not disappointed. We would definitely go back there.

review_data.title: Good place for lunch
review_data.content: This is a nice place for lunch if you like traditional Swiss food. They offer dishes like Rösti, Wurst-Käse-Salat, Stroganoff, Geschnetzeltes, etc. I went there several times and the food was always good. The dish normally comes with a side salad or soup. The salad...More

review_data.title: Good for a bite when you are buying specialities in the market
